title: Iron Man
synopsis: Tony Stark builds the first Iron Man armor while captured by terrorists. Returns home to refine the suit and battle Obadiah Stane/Iron Monger. Origin reimagined for modern era (Afghanistan replaces Vietnam). Nick Fury's post-credits appearance launches the MCU.

title: The Incredible Hulk
synopsis: Bruce Banner on the run from General Ross. Transforms into the Hulk. Battles Abomination in Harlem. Origin tweaked (gamma experiment, not bomb). Tony Stark cameo sets up Avengers recruitment.

title: Iron Man 2
synopsis: Tony faces palladium poisoning from the arc reactor. Justin Hammer and Ivan Vanko (Whiplash) team up against him. Black Widow introduced. Rhodes becomes War Machine. Nick Fury reveals SHIELD. Thor's hammer teased in post-credits.

title: Thor
synopsis: Thor banished to Earth by Odin. Learns humility. Battles the Destroyer. Loki's schemes for the throne. Fish-out-of-water comedy mixed with Asgardian mythology. Hawkeye cameo. Loki survives to menace the Avengers.

title: Captain America: The First Avenger
synopsis: Steve Rogers' WWII origin. Super-soldier serum. Battles Red Skull and Hydra. Bucky 'dies'. Cap crashes into the ice. Wakes up in modern day. Most faithful origin adaptation in Phase 1.

title: The Avengers
synopsis: Loki invades Earth with the Chitauri. Nick Fury assembles Iron Man, Cap, Thor, Hulk, Black Widow, Hawkeye. Battle of New York. Team dynamic loosely inspired by early Avengers comics. Thanos revealed in post-credits.

title: Iron Man 3
synopsis: Tony suffers PTSD from New York. Battles Aldrich Killian and the Mandarin (twist: fake). Extremis virus. Heavy deviation from comics. Tony destroys all suits, has arc reactor removed.

title: Thor: The Dark World
synopsis: Malekith and the Dark Elves seek the Aether (Reality Stone). Jane Foster infected. Loki's redemption arc begins. Frigga dies. Loki 'dies' again. Mostly original story loosely inspired by Thor mythology.

title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
synopsis: SHIELD infiltrated by Hydra. Bucky returns as the Winter Soldier. Cap, Widow, and Falcon expose the conspiracy. Helicarrier battle. Direct adaptation of Brubaker's Winter Soldier arc. Most faithful MCU adaptation outside Infinity War.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
synopsis: Peter Quill, Gamora, Drax, Rocket, Groot team up. Power Stone MacGuffin. Ronan the Accuser as villain. Loosely based on Abnett/Lanning's team roster. Tone and characterization original. Thanos pulls strings.

title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
synopsis: Tony creates Ultron AI. Ultron goes rogue, seeks extinction. Scarlet Witch and Quicksilver introduced. Vision created. Sokovia destroyed. Major deviation from comics Ultron origin (Pym). Sets up Civil War.

title: Ant-Man
synopsis: Scott Lang becomes Ant-Man under Hank Pym's mentorship. Heist film structure. Battles Yellowjacket (Darren Cross). Quantum Realm introduced. Wasp costume teased. Loosely inspired by comics but original story.

title: Captain America: Civil War
synopsis: Sokovia Accords divide Avengers. Iron Man (pro-regulation) vs Cap (anti). Bucky framed. Zemo manipulates everyone. Airport battle. Spider-Man and Black Panther introduced. Direct adaptation of Civil War event with reduced scale.

title: Doctor Strange
synopsis: Stephen Strange's origin. Car crash, learns mystic arts. Battles Kaecilius and Dormammu. Time Stone. Ancient One dies. Wong introduced. Fairly faithful origin with modern updates. Mordo's fall sets up sequel.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
synopsis: Peter meets his father Ego the Living Planet (Celestial). Yondu's redemption and death. Nebula and Gamora reconcile. Mantis joins team. Mostly original story. Adam Warlock teased in post-credits.

title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
synopsis: Teen Peter Parker under Tony Stark's mentorship. Battles Vulture (Adrian Toomes). High school comedy. Skips origin story. Heavy MCU integration. Major deviation from comics (no Uncle Ben, Tony as father figure).

title: Thor: Ragnarok
synopsis: Hela destroys Mjolnir, conquers Asgard. Thor enslaved on Sakaar by Grandmaster. Hulk as champion gladiator. Valkyrie introduced. Asgard destroyed. Planet Hulk and Ragnarok comics mashed together. Taika's comedy tone.

title: Black Panther
synopsis: T'Challa becomes king of Wakanda. Erik Killmonger challenges for the throne. Wakanda revealed to world. Shuri, Okoye, M'Baku introduced. Loosely based on Priest/Coates runs. Cultural phenomenon.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
synopsis: Thanos collects all six Infinity Stones. Battles Avengers/Guardians across galaxy. Vision killed. Gamora sacrificed. Thanos snaps, erases half the universe. Direct adaptation of Infinity Gauntlet with MCU characters. The Snap.

title: Ant-Man and the Wasp
synopsis: Scott and Hope rescue Janet van Dyne from Quantum Realm. Ghost (Ava Starr) seeks quantum healing. Heist sequel with comedy tone. Post-credits: team dusted by Snap. Sets up Endgame time travel.

title: Captain Marvel
synopsis: Carol Danvers' origin. Kree warrior discovers she's human. Skrulls revealed as refugees. Nick Fury origin. Set in 1995. Major changes from comics (Kree/Skrull role reversal). Binary powers. Pager to summon her in Endgame.

title: Avengers: Endgame
synopsis: Time heist to steal Infinity Stones from the past. Undo the Snap. Thanos from 2014 attacks. Tony snaps, dies. Cap grows old. Thor joins Guardians. Conclusion to Infinity Saga. Loose adaptation of Infinity Gauntlet's undoing.

title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
synopsis: Peter mourns Tony. School trip to Europe. Mysterio (Quentin Beck) manipulates Peter with illusions. Multiverse lie. Peter's identity revealed publicly. EDITH glasses. Original story with comics character.

title: Black Widow
synopsis: Natasha's origin story set between Civil War and Infinity War. Red Room conspiracy. Yelena Belova, Alexei (Red Guardian), Melina introduced. Taskmaster. Natasha frees Widows. Post-credits: Yelena recruited to hunt Hawkeye.

title: Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings
synopsis: Shang-Chi confronts his father, the Mandarin (Xu Wenwu). Ten Rings mystical artifacts. Ta-Lo dimension. Dragon battle. Katy introduced. Loosely based on Shang-Chi comics but heavily reimagined for MCU.

title: Eternals
synopsis: Eternals revealed as ancient immortals sent by Celestials. Stop Emergence (Earth's destruction). Ikaris betrays. Sersi, Thena, Kingo, Phastos, Makkari, Druig. Loosely inspired by Kirby's Eternals. Harry Styles as Starfox.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
synopsis: Doctor Strange's spell brings villains from multiverse. Green Goblin, Doc Ock, Sandman, Lizard, Electro. Tobey and Andrew return. MJ and Ned forget Peter. Inspired by One More Day but multiverse mechanism. Cultural phenomenon.

title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
synopsis: Wanda corrupted by Darkhold seeks America Chavez's multiverse-hopping power. Strange travels multiverse. Illuminati cameos. Wanda's villain turn. Horror tone (Raimi). Loosely inspired by Secret Wars multiverse but mostly original.

title: Thor: Love and Thunder
synopsis: Jane Foster becomes Mighty Thor (cancer subplot). Gorr the God Butcher seeks to kill all gods. Valkyrie as New Asgard king. Zeus cameo. Hercules introduced. Fairly faithful to Aaron's run but condensed.

title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
synopsis: T'Challa dies off-screen (Chadwick Boseman tribute). Namor and Talokan (underwater nation) invade. Shuri becomes new Black Panther. Riri Williams/Ironheart introduced. Original story honoring Boseman.

title: Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania
synopsis: Family trapped in Quantum Realm. Kang the Conqueror revealed as multiverse threat. Janet's secret past. MODOK (Darren Cross). Kang defeated but Council of Kangs teased. Sets up Kang Dynasty.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
synopsis: Rocket's origin revealed. High Evolutionary as villain. Adam Warlock introduced (underdeveloped). Team disbands. Peter returns to Earth. Gamora with alt-timeline Ravagers. Emotional conclusion to Gunn's trilogy.

title: The Marvels
synopsis: Carol, Monica (photon powers), Kamala team up. Powers entangled, swap places. Dar-Benn seeks Bangles. Hala destroyed. Monica trapped in X-Men universe (post-credits). Light team-up film.

title: Deadpool & Wolverine
synopsis: Deadpool recruits Wolverine variant from the Void. TVA involvement. Multiversal road trip. Meta-humor. X-Men cameos (Elektra, Blade, X-23, Johnny Storm). Integrates Fox Marvel into MCU. Hugh Jackman returns.

title: Captain America: Brave New World
synopsis: Sam Wilson as new Captain America. President Thaddeus Ross transforms into Red Hulk. Serpent Society as villains. Political thriller tone. Establishes Sam's Cap era. Adamantium introduced to MCU.

title: Thunderbolts*
synopsis: Anti-hero team: Bucky, Yelena, Red Guardian, Ghost, Taskmaster, US Agent, Sentry (Bob Reynolds). Valentina Allegra de Fontaine assembles team. Dark Avengers vibes. Asterisk mystery in title. Sentry as wildcard.

title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps
synopsis: FF origin set in alternate 1960s timeline. Reed, Sue, Johnny, Ben get powers. Galactus and Silver Surfer as villains. Retro-futuristic aesthetic. Shalla-Bal as Silver Surfer. Integrates FF into MCU multiverse.

title: WandaVision
synopsis: Wanda creates sitcom reality in Westview to cope with Vision's death. Agatha Harkness manipulates. Monica gains powers. Wanda becomes Scarlet Witch. Darkhold introduced. Twins Tommy and Billy. Sets up Multiverse of Madness.

title: The Falcon and the Winter Soldier
synopsis: Sam struggles with Cap's shield. Bucky atones for Winter Soldier past. Flag-Smashers (super-soldiers) seek globalism. John Walker becomes US Agent. Isaiah Bradley revealed. Sam becomes Captain America.

title: Loki (Season 1)
synopsis: TVA captures Loki variant. Mobius recruits him. Sylvie (female Loki) seeks revenge. He Who Remains (Kang variant) killed. Multiverse unleashed. Time travel bureaucracy comedy. Sets up Kang.

title: What If...? (Season 1)
synopsis: Animated anthology exploring multiverse variants. Peggy as Captain Carter, T'Challa as Star-Lord, Killmonger/Stark team-up, Zombie outbreak, etc. Uatu the Watcher narrates. Ultron steals Infinity Stones. Sets up Multiverse Saga.

title: Hawkeye
synopsis: Clint mentors Kate Bishop. Tracksuit Mafia. Echo (Maya Lopez) introduced. Yelena hunts Clint (Black Widow post-credits). Kingpin returns (Charlie Cox). Christmas setting. Fraction/Aja comic inspiration.

title: Moon Knight
synopsis: Marc Spector/Steven Grant/Jake Lockley with dissociative identity disorder. Khonshu's avatar. Battles Ammit and Arthur Harrow. Egyptian mythology. Standalone tone. Oscar Isaac's performance. Layla as Scarlet Scarab.

title: Ms. Marvel
synopsis: Kamala Khan gets Bangle powers (changed from Inhuman origin). Pakistani-American teen superhero. Family drama. Partition of India subplot. Damage Control as antagonists. Sets up The Marvels. Mutant reveal in finale.

title: She-Hulk: Attorney at Law
synopsis: Jennifer Walters becomes She-Hulk via Bruce's blood. Legal comedy. Fourth-wall breaks. Daredevil cameo. Abomination paroled. Titania rivalry. Wong, Madisynn. Meta-humor about MCU. K.E.V.I.N. finale.

title: Secret Invasion
synopsis: Skrulls infiltrate Earth. Gravik leads rebellion. Fury returns from space. Talos dies. Rhodey revealed as Skrull. G'iah gets Super-Skrull powers. Sonya Falsworth. Disappointing adaptation of Secret Invasion event.

title: Loki (Season 2)
synopsis: Loki time-slipping. TVA threatened. He Who Remains' plan revealed. Loki learns to control time. Becomes new keeper of the multiverse tree (Yggdrasil). Selfless sacrifice. Victor Timely (Kang variant).

title: Echo
synopsis: Maya Lopez returns to Oklahoma. Confronts Kingpin (her adoptive father). Choctaw heritage. Ancestral powers. Street-level. First Marvel Spotlight series. Daredevil: Born Again setup.

title: Agatha All Along
synopsis: Agatha Harkness assembles witch coven. The Witches' Road. Teen revealed as Billy Maximoff/Wiccan. Death (Aubrey Plaza) revealed. Agatha becomes ghost. Vision Quest setup. Young Avengers assembling.

title: What If...? (Season 2)
synopsis: More multiverse variants. Nebula as Nova, Captain Carter returns, Hela finds Ten Rings, 1602 universe, Kahhori (Mohawk hero). Uatu interferes more directly. Strange Supreme returns.

title: What If...? (Season 3)
synopsis: Final season. Red Guardian/Winter Soldier team-up, Agatha/Howard the Duck 1940s noir, Storm as Goddess of Thunder, Avengers mecha suit, etc. Multiverse Saga anthology conclusion.

title: Daredevil: Born Again
synopsis: Matt Murdock and Kingpin return (Netflix continuity soft-reboot). Karen Page, Foggy Nelson return. Punisher guest stars. Muse as villain. White Tiger introduced. Bullseye returns. 18 episodes across two seasons.

title: Ironheart
synopsis: Riri Williams builds armor at MIT. The Hood as villain. Magic vs tech. Wakanda Forever followup. Parker Robbins seeks power. Shuri cameo expected.

title: Eyes of Wakanda
synopsis: Animated anthology. Wakandan warriors through history protecting vibranium secrets. War Dogs missions. Expands Black Panther lore across centuries.

title: Wonder Man
synopsis: Simon Williams as actor/superhero. Hollywood satire. Trevor Slattery (Ben Kingsley) returns. Yahya Abdul-Mateen II stars. Zemo rumored. Explores celebrity superhero culture.

title: Marvel Zombies
synopsis: Animated horror. Zombified heroes from What If...? universe. Survivors fight undead Avengers. Continues What If S1 zombie episode. TV-MA rating. Shang-Chi, Katy, Okoye, Yelena, Red Guardian, Jimmy Woo team up.

title: Werewolf by Night
synopsis: Jack Russell (werewolf) and Elsa Bloodstone hunt for Bloodstone gem. Black-and-white horror homage. Man-Thing appears. Supernatural side of MCU. Michael Giacchino directs. Monster hunters introduced.

title: The Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special
synopsis: Drax and Mantis kidnap Kevin Bacon as Christmas gift for Quill. Knowhere celebration. Wholesome comedy. Mantis revealed as Quill's half-sister. Cosmo the Spacedog. Sets up Vol. 3 emotional beats.
